00048 double
00049 IdModule(COMPLEX_FLOAT z)
00050 { 
00051   return sqrt((double)(z.re * z.re + z.im * z.im));
00052 }
00056 double
00057 IdPhase(COMPLEX_FLOAT z)
00058 { 
00059   return atan2((double) z.im, (double) z.re);
00060 }

00071 double 
00072 IdCalcDistance2Points(double x1, double y1, double x2, double y2)
00073 {
00074    double carre;
00075    carre = (x2 - x1) * (x2 - x1) + (y2 - y1) * (y2 - y1);
00076    if (carre == 0.0)
00077       return (0.0);
00078    else
00079       return sqrt(carre);
00080 }

00096 double 
00097 IdCalcDistancePointDroite(double x, double y,
00098           double x1, double y1,
00099           double x2, double y2)
00100 {
00101    double dist, num, denom;
00102 
00103    num = abs((x - x1) * (y2 - y1) - (x2 - x1) * (y - y1));
00104    denom = sqrt((x2 - x1) * (x2 - x1) + (y2 - y1) * (y2 - y1));
00105    if ((x1 == x2) && (y1 == y2))
00106       dist = 0.0;
00107    else
00108       dist = num / denom;
00109 
00110    return (dist);
00111 }

00119 double 
00120 IdCalcAngleFromCotes(double dx, double dy)
00121 {
00122    double pente;
00123    if (dx == 0) {
00124       if (dy > 0)
00125          pente = M_PI / 2;
00126       else
00127          pente = 3. * M_PI / 2;
00128    } else {
00129       pente = ((float) dy) / ((float) dx);
00130       if (dx > 0) {
00131          if (dy > 0)
00132             pente = atan(pente);
00133          else
00134             pente = atan(pente) + 2 * M_PI;
00135       } else
00136          pente = M_PI + atan(pente);
00137    }
00138    return (pente);
00139 }

00154 double 
00155 IdCalcAngleFromPoints(double xB, double yB,
00156          double xA, double yA,
00157          double xC, double yC)
00158 {
00159    double alpha, beta, gamma;
00160    double xAn, yAn, xBn, yBn, xCn, yCn;
00161 
00162    /*
00163     * changement de repere : 
00164     * translation de l'origine de l'ancien repere en A 
00165     */
00166    xAn = 0.;
00167    yAn = 0.;
00168    xBn = xB - xA;
00169    yBn = yB - yA;
00170    xCn = xC - xA;
00171    yCn = yC - yA;
00172 
00173    /*
00174     * beta est l'angle forme entre l'axe X' du nouveau repere 
00175     * et le segment [AB] 
00176     */
00177    beta = atan2(yBn, xBn);
00178 
00179    /*
00180     * gamma est l'angle forme entre l'axe X' du nouveau repere 
00181     * et le segment [AC] 
00182     */
00183    gamma = atan2(yCn, xCn);
00184 
00185    /*
00186     * alpha = beta - gamma 
00187     */
00188    alpha = beta - gamma;
00189 
00190    alpha = -alpha;
00191    return (alpha);
00192 }

00205 int 
00206 IdCalcRotatePoint(double x, double y, 
00207       double centreX, double centreY, 
00208       double angle, 
00209       double *nouvX, double *nouvY)
00210 {
00211    double sinAlph, cosAlph;
00212 
00213    if (angle == 0.0) {
00214       *nouvX = x;
00215       *nouvY = y;
00216       return (1);
00217    }
00218 
00219    sinAlph = sin(angle);
00220    cosAlph = cos(angle);
00221 
00222    *nouvX =
00223        cosAlph * (x - centreX) - sinAlph * (y - centreY) + centreX;
00224    *nouvY =
00225        sinAlph * (x - centreX) + cosAlph * (y - centreY) + centreY;
00226 
00227    return (1);
00228 }

00230 
00243 int 
00244 IdCalcZoomPoint(double x, double y, 
00245       double centreX, double centreY, 
00246       double percent, double *nouvX, double *nouvY)
00247 {
00248    double angle;
00249    double oldDist, newDist;
00250 
00251    if (percent == 0.0) {
00252       *nouvX = x;
00253       *nouvY = y;
00254       return (1);
00255    }
00256 
00257    angle = atan2((double) (y - centreY), (double) (x - centreX));
00258 
00259    oldDist = IdCalcDistance2Points((double) centreX, (double) centreY,
00260                (double) x, (double) y);
00261    newDist = oldDist * percent;
00262 
00263    *nouvX = centreX + newDist * cos(angle);
00264    *nouvY = centreY + newDist * sin(angle);
00265 
00266    return (1);
00267 }

00269 static double sqrarg;
00270 #define SQR(a) ((sqrarg=(a)) == 0.0 ? 0.0 : sqrarg*sqrarg)
00271 
00278 double 
00279 IdCalcPythagore(double a, double b)
00280 {
00281    double absa, absb;
00282 
00283    absa = fabs(a);
00284    absb = fabs(b);
00285    if (absa > absb)
00286       return (absa * sqrt(1.0 + SQR(absb / absa)));
00287    else
00288       return (absb ==
00289          0.0 ? 0.0 : absb * sqrt(1.0 + SQR(absa / absb)));
00290 }

00300 PVECTOR_COMPLEX 
00301 IdCalcRacinesPoly2(double a, double b, double c)
00302 {
00303    double d, signe, den;
00304    COMPLEX q;
00305    PVECTOR_COMPLEX racines;
00306 
00307    racines = (PVECTOR_COMPLEX) IdVectAlloc(2, VECT_COMPLEX);
00308    if (!racines) {
00309       IdErrPrintf("\n Erreur allocation solution du 2nd degre");
00310       IdExit(1);
00311    }
00312 
00313    d = (double) (b * b - 4.0 * a * c);
00314    if (b >= 0.0)
00315       signe = 1.0;
00316    else
00317       signe = -1.0;
00318 
00319    if (d >= 0.0) {
00320       q.re = -(b + signe * sqrt(d)) / 2;
00321       q.im = 0.0;
00322    } else {
00323       q.re = -b / 2;
00324       q.im = -signe * sqrt(-d) / 2;
00325    }
00326    den = q.im * q.im + q.re * q.re;
00327    racines[0].re = q.re / a;
00328    racines[0].im = q.im / a;
00329    racines[1].re = c * q.re / den;
00330    racines[1].im = -c * q.im / den;
00331 
00332    return (racines);
00333 }
00334 
00344 PVECTOR_COMPLEX 
00345 IdCalcRacinesPoly3(double a, double b, double c, double d)
00346 {
00347    PVECTOR_COMPLEX racines;
00348    double q2, Q, R, A=0., B=0., C=0., S, T;
00349    double teta, teta3, A3, Q3, KPI = (double) M_PI * 2 / 3, signe;
00350 
00351    if (!a) {
00352       IdErrPrintf("\n Erreur degre du polynome");
00353       IdExit(1);
00354    } else {
00355       A = b / a;
00356       B = c / a;
00357       C = d / a;
00358    }
00359 
00360    racines = (PVECTOR_COMPLEX) IdSigAlloc(3, VECT_COMPLEX);
00361 
00362    if (!racines) {
00363       IdErrPrintf("\n Erreur allocation solution 3eme degre");
00364       IdExit(1);
00365    }
00366 
00367    R = (A * A * A * 2 - A * B * 9 + C * 27) / 54;
00368    Q = (A * A - B * 3) / 9;
00369    Q3 = Q * Q * Q;
00370    A3 = A / 3;
00371 
00372    if (R * R < Q3) {
00373       teta = acos(R / sqrt(Q3));
00374       teta3 = teta / 3;
00375       q2 = -sqrt(Q) * 2;
00376 
00377       racines[0].re = q2 * cos(teta3) - A3;
00378       racines[0].im = (double) 0.0;
00379 
00380       racines[1].re = q2 * cos(teta3 + KPI) - A3;
00381       racines[1].im = (double) 0.0;
00382 
00383       racines[2].re = q2 * cos(teta3 - KPI) - A3;
00384       racines[2].im = (double) 0.0;
00385 
00386    } else {
00387       if (R >= (double) 0.0)
00388          signe = (double) 1.0;
00389       else {
00390          signe = (double) (-1.0);
00391          R = -R;
00392       }
00393       S =
00394           -signe * pow((R + sqrt(R * R - Q3)),
00395              (double) (1.0 / 3.0));
00396       if (S != (double) 0.0)
00397          T = Q / S;
00398       else
00399          T = (double) 0.0;
00400 
00401       racines[0].re = S + T - A3;
00402       racines[0].im = (double) 0.0;
00403 
00404       racines[1].re = -(S + T) / 2 - A3;
00405       racines[1].im = (S - T) * sqrt((double) 3.0) / 2;
00406 
00407       racines[2].re = -(S + T) / 2 - A3;
00408       racines[2].im = -(S - T) * sqrt((double) 3.0) / 2;
00409    }
00410 
00411    return (racines);
00412 }

00424 int 
00425 IdCalcNbElemIntEnum(int *tabInterv, int nbInterv)
00426 {
00427    int nbElem = 0;
00428    int i;
00429    for (i = 0; i < nbInterv * 2; i += 2)
00430       nbElem = nbElem + tabInterv[i + 1] - tabInterv[i] + 1;
00431    return (nbElem);
00432 }

00439 int 
00440 IdCalcArrondInt(double x)
00441 {
00442    int sgn;
00443    double xabs = fabs(x);
00444 
00445    sgn = (x < 0.0) ? -1 : 1;
00446    if ((xabs - floor(xabs)) >= 0.5)
00447       return (sgn * (int) ceil(xabs));
00448    else
00449       return (sgn * (int) floor(xabs));
00450 
00451 }

00459 float IdCalcFloatFromSun(float *origine)
00460 {
00461    typedef struct {
00462       unsigned signe:1;
00463       unsigned caracteristique:7;
00464       unsigned mantisse:24;
00465    } FORME_SUN;
00466 
00467    FORME_SUN number;
00468    float result;
00469    int i;
00470 
00471    /*
00472     * Pour du code propre il faudrait invoquer memcpy...
00473     */
00474    for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00475       *((char *) (&number) + i) = *((char *) origine + i);
00476 
00477    if (number.signe == 0 && number.caracteristique == 0
00478        && number.mantisse == 0)
00479       return (0.0);
00480    result = (float) number.mantisse / (1 << 24) *
00481        pow(16.0, number.caracteristique - 64.0);
00482    return ((number.signe == 0) ? result : -result);
00483 }
00484 
00491 float 
00492 IdCalcFloatFromIEEE754(float *origine)
00493 {
00494    float result;
00495    unsigned int mantisse, signe, caracteristique;
00496 
00497    signe = (((char *) origine)[0] & 0x80) >> 7;
00498 
00499    mantisse = ((char *) origine)[0] & 0x7f;
00500    mantisse = mantisse << 1;
00501 
00502    caracteristique = ((char *) origine)[1] & 0x80;
00503    if (caracteristique != 0)
00504       mantisse++;
00505    caracteristique = (((char *) origine)[1] & 0x7f) << 17;
00506    caracteristique +=
00507        (((char *) origine)[2] << 9) + ((char *) origine)[3];
00508 
00509    if (signe == 0 && caracteristique == 0 && mantisse == 0)
00510       return (0.0);
00511 
00512    result = ((float) caracteristique / (1 << 24) + 1.)
00513        * pow(2.0, mantisse - 127.0);
00514 
00515    return ((signe == 0) ? result : -result);
00516 }

00520 #define IA 16807
00521 #define IM 2147483647
00522 #define AM (1.0/IM)
00523 #define IQ 127773
00524 #define IR 2836
00525 #define NTAB 32
00526 #define NDIV (1+(IM-1)/NTAB)
00527 #define EPS 1.2e-7
00528 #define RNMX (1.0-EPS)
00529 
00536 float 
00537 IdCalcRand1(long *idum)
00538 {
00539    int j;
00540    long k;
00541    static long iy = 0;
00542    static long iv[NTAB];
00543    float temp;
00544 
00545    if (*idum <= 0 || !iy) {
00546       if (-(*idum) < 1)
00547          *idum = 1;
00548       else
00549          *idum = -(*idum);
00550       for (j = NTAB + 7; j >= 0; j--) {
00551          k = (*idum) / IQ;
00552          *idum = IA * (*idum - k * IQ) - IR * k;
00553          if (*idum < 0)
00554             *idum += IM;
00555          if (j < NTAB)
00556             iv[j] = *idum;
00557       }
00558       iy = iv[0];
00559    }
00560    k = (*idum) / IQ;
00561    *idum = IA * (*idum - k * IQ) - IR * k;
00562    if (*idum < 0)
00563       *idum += IM;
00564    j = iy / NDIV;
00565    iy = iv[j];
00566    iv[j] = *idum;
00567    if ((temp = AM * iy) > RNMX)
00568       return RNMX;
00569    else
00570       return temp;
00571 }
00572 
00573 #undef IA
00574 #undef IM
00575 #undef AM
00576 #undef IQ
00577 #undef IR
00578 #undef NTAB
00579 #undef NDIV
00580 #undef EPS
00581 #undef RNMX

00592 short int 
00593 IdCalcSwapInt16(short int *a, int sw)
00594 {
00595    short int b=0;
00596 
00597    if (!sw)
00598       return (*a);
00599 
00600    if (sw == 4321)
00601       b = (((*a << 8) & 0x0ff00) | ((*a >> 8) & 0x00ff));
00602    return (b);
00603 }
00604 
00613 int 
00614 IdCalcSwapInt32(int * a, int sw)
00615 {
00616    int b = 0;
00617    /*
00618     * attention: il aura surement un pb pour les entiers negatifs ...
00619     */
00620    if (!sw)
00621       return (*a);
00622 
00623    if (sw == 4321)
00624       b = (((*a << 24) & 0xff000000) | ((*a << 8) & 0x00ff0000) |
00625            ((*a >> 8) & 0x0000ff00) | ((*a >> 24) & 0x000000ff));
00626    if (sw == 3412)
00627       b =
00628           (((*a << 16) & 0xffff0000) |
00629            ((*a >> 16) & 0x0000ffff));
00630 
00631    if (sw == 2143)
00632       b = (((*a << 8) & 0xff00ff00) | ((*a >> 8) & 0x00ff00ff));
00633 
00634    return (b);
00635 }

00642 /*
00643  * Fonction de calcul de la distance d'un point (x, y, z) au plan 
00644  * centre de coefficients directeurs px, py, pz 
00645  */
00646 
00647 
00662 double
00663 IdGetDistanceFromPlane(int x, int y, int z, int px, int py, int pz)
00664 {
00665    double rval;
00666 
00667    rval =
00668        fabs(((double) x * px) + ((double) y * py) +
00669        ((double) z * pz));
00670    return rval / sqrt(sqr((double) px) + sqr((double) py) +
00671             sqr((double) pz));
00672 }
